What we know about President Trump‚Äôs Health Care agenda: 

He supports letting employers impose lifetime & annual limits on critical types of health care. That means coverage could be cut off just when you get sick & need it most. 

But isn‚Äôt that the whole point of health care?
The Republican health care agenda? It would mean cutting coverage for critical care like mental health treatment, substance abuse care for things like opioid addiction, and maternity care.
Republican junk plans won‚Äôt cover maternity care. That‚Äôs why groups that protect women and people with pre-existing conditions went to court this week to fight for it.

President Trump & GOP pushed a health care agenda that would let insurance companies charge older Americans 5X MORE than younger people.

Premiums could be $15K more per year.

Does that help Americans get better care?
